text: ye log jinako musharekeen (apana khuda samajhakar) ibaadat karate hain vah khud apane paravaradigaar kee qurabat ke zarie dhoondhate phirate hain ki (dekho) inamen se kaun jyaada kurabat rakhata hai aur usakee rahamat kee ummeed rakhate aur usake azaab se darate hain isamen shaq nahin ki tere paravaradigaar ka azaab darane kee cheez hai
